dialogues.speaker: Obakashito
dialogues.message: my genjutsu doesn't work on the skeletons...

dialogues.speaker: Obakashito
dialogues.message: ...and they destroyed the book i was reading...

dialogues.speaker: Obakashito
dialogues.message: ...now i'll never know how Make-Out Paradise ends...

dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: Make-Out Paradise?? Well... maybe it's a good thing they destroyed it then...
